entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 4:56 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.7°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: NNW 26 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
